In England, in the seven days to 16 June, there were 50,599 new confirmed cases (89.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 June, there were 37,831 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 34% (12,768 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 June is 4,044,830 (7,186.1 cases per 100,000 population).
